revised_title: Neanderthal Skull Characteristics and Their Relation to Modern Human Skulls
tldr: The author compares the Neanderthal skull with the skulls of recent human races and Australian aborigines, analyzing their cranial and facial features. They find that while the Neanderthal skull has some similarities to modern human skulls, it also has distinct features that set it apart. The author believes that the Neanderthals should be considered a separate race or species due to these differences.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Human Evolution
